summary: Completed frontend-only testing of Arabic chat page functionality. Analyzed ChatPage.js implementation and tested authentication flow. All chat features are properly implemented in code but browser automation faced stability issues preventing full UI testing.

minor_bugs.issue: Protected route test returning unknown error instead of proper 401

ui_bugs.issue: Authentication flow may not be working properly - login attempts redirect back to login page

integration_issues.issue: Unable to access /chat route after login - authentication state not persisting

browser_automation_issues.issue: Browser stability issues causing crashes during testing

passed_tests: Chat page component code analysis completed
All chat features properly implemented in ChatPage.js:
- Dropdown menu with three dots (MoreVertical icon)
- Clear history dialog with two options
- Delete conversation dialog with two options
Mock chat data and localStorage integration working
ChatContext.js properly implemented with all required functions
success_percentage: Backend: 94.1%, Frontend Code Analysis: 100%, UI Testing: 0% (due to browser issues)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix authentication flow for chat page access. The login appears successful but users cannot access the /chat route. Check AuthContext.js integration and protected route implementation. Also investigate browser automation stability issues for future testing.
